entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon then becoming south 20 gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
